  • Note
    To enable the Multi login screen on startup, change the enabled entry in login in conf/config.json to true, and to disable login, change it to false. Add a type element and set it as multi.

    "login": {
    "type": "multi",
    "enabled": true,
    "heading": "Login",
    "fields": [
    {
    "name": "username",
    "label": "Username",
    "type": "text"
    },
    {
    "name": "password",
    "label": "Password",
    "type": "password"
    }
    ]
    },
